mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(plan_no)+1, 1) as plan_no FROM plan
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan( plan_no, member_id, plan_name, plan_headcount, plan_type, plan_departure, plan_arrival, plan_stay, plan_date, plan_update, plan_total_money, plan_memo ) VALUES( #{planNo}, #{memberId}, #{planName}, #{planHeadcount}, #{planType}, #{planDeparture}, #{planArrival}, #{planStay}, CURDATE(), CURDATE(), 0, #{planMemo} )

INSERT INTO city_route( city_route_no, plan_no, city_route_date, city_route_departure_city, city_route_arrival_city, city_route_departure_time, city_route_arrival_time, city_route_memo ) VALUES
#{cityRouteDtoList.cityRouteNo}, #{cityRouteDtoList.planNo}, #{cityRouteDtoList.cityRouteDate}, #{cityRouteDtoList.cityRouteDepartureCity}, #{cityRouteDtoList.cityRouteArrivalCity}, #{cityRouteDtoList.cityRouteDepartureTime}, #{cityRouteDtoList.cityRouteArrivalTime}, #{cityRouteDtoList.cityRouteMemo}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(landmark_plan_no)+1, 1) as landmark_plan_no FROM landmark_plan;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO landmark_plan( landmark_plan_no, plan_no, city_route_no, landmark_info_no ) VALUES
#{cityRouteDtoList.landmarkPlanNo}, #{cityRouteDtoList.planNo}, #{cityRouteDtoList.cityRouteNo}, #{cityRouteDtoList.landmarkInfoNo}
mapper.select: SELECT city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city_info_do_name as 'cityInfoDoName', city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', city_info_langitude as 'cityInfoLangitude', city_info_latitude as 'cityInfoLatitude', city_info_summary as 'cityInfoSummary', city_info_image as 'cityInfoImage' FROM city_info

SELECT landmark_info_no as 'landmarkInfoNo', landmark_info_name as 'landmarkInfoName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', landmark_info_langitude as 'landmarkInfoLangitude', landmark_info_latitude as 'landmarkInfoLatitude', landmark_info_image as 'landmarkInfoImage' FROM landmark_info WHERE city_info_no = ( SELECT city_info_no FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name=#{clickCityName} )

SELECT eatery_no as 'eateryNo', eatery_name as 'eateryName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo' FROM eatery_info WHERE city_info_no = ( SELECT city_info_no FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name=#{clickCityName} ) LIMIT #{infoMoreView}

SELECT stay_info_no as 'stayInfoNo', stay_info_name as 'stayInfoName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo' FROM stay_info WHERE city_info_no = ( SELECT city_info_no FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name=#{clickCityName} ) LIMIT #{infoMoreView}

SELECT event_info_name as 'eventInfoName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo' FROM event_info WHERE city_info_no = ( SELECT city_info_no FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name=#{clickCityName} ) LIMIT #{infoMoreView}
